posts.post_content: SOLD SOLD Last call on this Cobb before he goes back into hiding.SOLD! postpaid. Will consider partial trades as well as trades for Wagner items. Email takes priority over posts. Thanks- Front and Back scans. (hazy cloud above card is from scanner, not on holder)

I'm considering offering this Wagner in trade for your Cobb, but I don't know the estimated values of either.  I suspect the Wagner may be worth a bit more, but I really don't know.  Do you?

In any event, are you interested?

Let me know before I go any further.

I'm leaving for the day, won't be back till tonight.  Thanks.

Doug
Doug- Thanks for the offer. Don't have much interest in the E91's. Generally they do not picture the named player.
